title: Favorite Track
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Ayumu-san, are you okay? Are you getting tired?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>No, I’m fine. After all, you’re matching my speed, Rin-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe~. Hey, so, how are you finding this track that Rin found? Is it fun?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah! Running along a riverbank feels great. You can see really far, and there are plenty of blooming flowers by the roadside, plus....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Plus, that dog that was taking a walk was really cute nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufufu. I really liked it too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>That dog was such a good dog, it let us pet it nya~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>It licked your face so much, right, Rin-chan. I wonder if it has taken a liking to you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>You got licked a lot too nya! Rin thinks it also really liked you nya, Ayumu-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ehehe, I’m happy if that’s true. It’ll be nice if we can meet again~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
